bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and Method for Implementing Financial Assistance Programs

abstract.p: A system and method to provide food stamp benefits to recipients. The state agency responsible for distributing food stamp benefits to eligible recipients employs an issuer to produce consumer access devices for distribution to the recipients. The consumer access device is encoded with information enabling the food stamp recipients to purchase specified items from merchants. By imprinting the consumer access device with indicia identifying a commercial payment processing network and employing the commercial payment processing network to process the transactions, transaction funded by the food stamp program will appear to be credit or debit transactions personally funded by the food stamp recipient.

abstract.p: A system and method to provide food stamp benefits to recipients. The state agency responsible for distributing food stamp benefits to eligible recipients employs an issuer to produce consumer access devices for distribution to the recipients. The consumer access device is encoded with information enabling the food stamp recipients to purchase specified items from merchants. By imprinting the consumer access device with indicia identifying a commercial payment processing network and employing the commercial payment processing network to process the transactions, transaction funded by the food stamp program will appear to be credit or debit transactions personally funded by the food stamp recipient.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR IMPLEMENTING FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE PROGRAMS
SYSTÈME ET PROCÉDÉ POUR METTRE EN OEVRE DES PROGRAMMES D'ASSISTANCE FINANCIÈRE

abstract.p: A system and method to provide food stamp benefits to recipients (122). The state agency (120) responsible for distributing food stamp benefits to eligible recipients employs an issuer (112) to produce consumer access devices (124) for distribution to the recipients. The consumer access device is encoded with information enabling the food stamp recipients to purchase specified items from merchants (118). By imprinting the consumer access device with indicia identifying a commercial payment processing network (114) and employing the commercial payment processing network to process the transactions, transaction funded by the food stamp program will appear to be credit or debit transactions personally funded by the food stamp recipient.

L'invention concerne un système et un procédé pour offrir des avantages de coupons alimentaires à des bénéficiaires (122). L'agence publique (120) responsable de la distribution des avantages de coupons élémentaires à des bénéficiaires éligibles emploie un émetteur (112) pour produire des dispositifs d'accès grand public (124) pour la distribution aux bénéficiaires. Le dispositif d'accès grand public est codé avec des informations permettant aux bénéficiaires de coupons alimentaires d'acheter des articles spécifiés auprès des commerçants (118).

Par l'impression du dispositif d'accès grand public avec des indices identifiant un réseau de traitement de paiement commercial (114) et l'emploi du réseau de traitement de paiement commercial pour traiter les transactions, les transactions financées par le programme de coupons alimentaires apparaîtront comme des transactions de crédit ou de débit financées personnellement par le bénéficiaire des coupons alimentaires.
